Text:
Uhhh, I downloaded the ISO from the Lubuntu site, saw that the latest version wasn't listed here, decided to try uploading my first torrent, and did so.

Funny thing is, as soon as it was listed, it had 84 seeders already, so it's the same file as everyone else but got listed on this site late in the game.

Download it here, download it on the Lubuntu website, either works and gets the same result.

Is it the same as this one?:

http://linuxtracker.org/index.php?page=torrent-details&id=4feff401af33530329967f3ed3a5e6dff7e15399

INFOHASH:

4feff401af33530329967f3ed3a5e6dff7e15399
How about you tell me what the heck an md5checksum is.

Yes, the md5 checksum match!

THIS IS GENUINE!
Thanks for the validation.  You'd think with 107 people seeding at least one would have said "Hey, this is bullshit."  But they don't, because it's real.  Fuck's sake.

I downloaded this torrent just to spite all of the people who are too lazy to do anything but cry wolf.

md5sum: 76e5865ce8d0d08fa9f833d781016fe3  lubuntu-11.04.iso
Matches the one found here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuHashes
Thanks! Will post it if there ever is a next time.
